description.content:
Customer OTP and Staff Login Endpoints

All authentication requests return a JWT token that must be included in subsequent requests.
The JWT is automatically extracted and stored in the {{jwt_token}} variable.

exec: // Save OTP for next request (if available in development)

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Hyderabadi Biryani",
  "description": "Authentic Hyderabadi biryani with fragrant basmati rice",
  "price": 250,
  "category": "Main Course",
  "available": true
}

description.content: Your unique tenant identifier - update with your actual tenant ID
Test customer phone number for OTP-based authentication. Use any valid Indian phone number (10 digits). System auto-creates customer on first OTP request.
Auto-populated with OTP from request-otp endpoint
Staff username for login. Default test users: manager1, chef1, waiter1. Change in production!
Staff password. Default test password for all users. CHANGE IN PRODUCTION!

Production API collection for IntelliDine SaaS platform. Comprehensive API with 35 endpoints across 9 microservices. Includes authentication, menu management, orders, payments, inventory, analytics, notifications, and discount engine.

üöÄ PRODUCTION DEPLOYMENT
üìç Base URL: https://intellidine-api.aahil-khan.tech
‚ö†Ô∏è  Do NOT modify the base_url variable - all requests route through the API Gateway
‚úÖ All 35 endpoints verified working
üîê JWT Token-based authentication
üë• Multi-tenant isolated data

üìã QUICK START:
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Variables are pre-configured - no changes needed to test!
3. Start with 'Customer - Request OTP' in Authentication folder
4. Enter any phone number (e.g., 9876543210)
5. The system auto-creates customer on first use
6. OTP automatically extracted and used in 'Verify OTP' request
7. JWT token automatically saved and used in all subsequent requests

‚öôÔ∏è STAFF LOGIN:
‚Ä¢ Staff authentication requires pre-created users in the database
‚Ä¢ To create staff users, run SQL in your database:
  INSERT INTO users (id, tenant_id, username, email, password_hash, role, is_active)
  VALUES (uuid_generate_v4(), '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111', 'manager1', 'manager@spiceroute.com', '$2b$10$...', 'MANAGER', true);
‚Ä¢ Password must be bcrypt hashed (use online bcrypt tools or your password hashing function)
‚Ä¢ Default test credentials will be provided in your tenant setup documentation

üìä TESTING FLOW:
1. Customer OTP Flow: Request OTP ‚Üí Verify OTP ‚Üí Get JWT ‚Üí Use for API calls
2. Staff Flow: Login ‚Üí Get JWT ‚Üí Use for API calls
3. All endpoints automatically maintain JWT in Authorization header
